description: Solution:Novatek 96650Lens:fixed focusZoom:4 x digitalLCD Display:2.7 inch 16:9 TFT LCDLens Angle:120 degree ultra wide angle lensNight Video:enhanced led lightsVideo OutputAV(SVBS): composite TV signal output NTSC/PALHigh definition TV terminal interface: HDMI signal output Max 1920X1080Picture:JPG file format Maximum output pixel: 5.0 Mega PixelsVideo Resolution:1920x1080, 1280x720, 848 x 480Audio:Built-in Microphone/Speaker(AAC)Codec:MPEG4G-Sensor:G-Sensor to keep the record of sensor data at emergency cannotbe coverMemorizer:External media: SDHC(support 32G Max, NOT INCLUDED IN) (suggest to use the real and original Brand memory card to reduce the incompatible issues )Port:USB/HDMI/AVMotion Detection:YesShutter:Electronic shutterNight quality: Netural with White led light.Battery:3.7V 300mAh Poly, (so if only power on with battery, it only last 3~10mins)Features1. Powerful document protection function, the video will be saved intactly even though there are power outages or machine damage occurred under recording.2. Seamless continuous recording, it will not miss any data.3. Applied Auto cigarette power supply, can recording while driving.4. Turn on and recording automatically when car starts,5. Automatic circulating recording, its able to set the record time for each file.6. Watching video simultaneous while driving, supporting on-spot play back.7. Setting video recording time, it will stop recording automatically when time is up.8. Screen shots function, to capture video picture under recording and reviewing.10. Can charge through USB.Accessory:In-car charging cableIn-car holderUSB cableUser ManualHDMI cable
title: Black Box Original Quality Real Full HD 1080P 1920x1080 H.264 G1W 2.7" LCD Car DVR Camera Recorder Dashboard Dashcam Black Box Video Recorder With G-sensor Night Vision Motion Detection Wide Degree 120° 4X Zoom
